title: Extension Challenge: Add Advanced Features
description:
**Challenge 1: Add Time-Based Analysis**

Extend the analyzer to:
- Parse timestamps properly
- Group logs by hour
- Find peak error times
- Calculate time ranges

**Challenge 2: Add Filtering**

Add ability to:
- Filter by date range
- Filter by log level
- Search for keywords in messages
- Export filtered results

**Challenge 3: Add Statistical Analysis**

Calculate:
- Average errors per hour
- Error rate percentage
- Time between errors
- Most active hours

**Starter code for Challenge 1:**
instructions:
**Challenge 1: Add Time-Based Analysis**

Extend the analyzer to:
- Parse timestamps properly
- Group logs by hour
- Find peak error times
- Calculate time ranges

**Challenge 2: Add Filtering**

Add ability to:
- Filter by date range
- Filter by log level
- Search for keywords in messages
- Export filtered results

**Challenge 3: Add Statistical Analysis**

Calculate:
- Average errors per hour
- Error rate percentage
- Time between errors
- Most active hours

**Starter code for Challenge 1:**

hints.text: Use datetime.strptime() to parse timestamps. Use datetime.hour to extract hour. Use defaultdict(list) to group by hour.

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
